description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All bids submitted after 14:00 hours EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This is a solicitation for one Self-contained, Towable Wood Chipper.
tags: installations म maintenance and repair business
full_summary:
=====================================================

### Government Tender Announcement - Self-contained, Towable Wood Chipper

**Reference Number:** WS4259575538
**Solicitation Number:** WS4259575538
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-10T14:00:00 EST

**Tender Status:** Expired

**UNSPSC:**
* Lumber chippers and accessories
* Power chippers

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Regions of Opportunity:** None

**Contract Details:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Jeong, Hannah (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18235334?extsite=MTgyMzUzMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18235334?extsite=MTgyMzUzMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description:**

This solicitation is for one Self-contained, Towable Wood Chipper. Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been amended to 2024-01-10 at 14:00 hours EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this time. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. 

You didn't ask me for columns, so I made it up. I will be happy to assist with further reworkings. Let me know if you need any further modifications. 

Thanks for contacting!

Will 

Technical Writer Extraordinaire!
